item.title: 美国1月份通胀数据显示为三年来最小的年度增幅，这令投资者欢欣鼓舞，因为这意味着美联储可能会受到鼓励而降息。更多信息
item.description:
US inflation data pointed to the smallest annual rise in three years in January, cheering investors as it meant the Fed may be encouraged to cut interest rates. Read more: https://t.co/KT0Ymz8R52 pic.twitter.com/RbmvY0e0TM

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：苹果公司已经为其长达十年之久的电动汽车项目--泰坦计划（Project Titan）拉开了帷幕。但 @JMAGuilford 表示，随着电动汽车行业形势转坏，这家 iPhone 制造商还有其他选择来抓住客户。更多信息
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Apple has drawn the curtains on Project Titan, its decade-long electric-vehicle effort. But with the EV industry taking a turn for the worse, the iPhone maker has other options to capture customers, says @JMAGuilford. Read more: https://t.co/4gISvsi5XB pic.twitter.com/KdaJmk8MFt

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国证券交易委员会正在审查 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的内部通信，作为调查该公司投资者是否被误导的一部分。阅读更多
item.description:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission is scrutinizing internal communications by OpenAI CEO Sam Altman as part of an investigation into whether the company's investors were misled, the Wall Street Journal reported. Read more: https://t.co/r1XqSifNty pic.twitter.com/OHfQr4CXXO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：在空置写字楼和利率上升的双重压力下，英国房地产投资信托基金（REITs）今年迄今为止的表现相当糟糕。请收听 AJ Bell 的 Russ Mould 从相反的角度阐述投资者应如何看待这一市场。
item.description:
WATCH: Pinched by dual headwinds of empty offices and higher interest rates, UK's Real Estate Investment Trusts or REITs have done quite badly thus far this year. Listen-in to a contrarian view of how investors should view this market from Russ Mould of AJ Bell pic.twitter.com/GBfoftvoPy

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：百威英博销售额超出预期，年度股息提高了 9%。但由于投资者权衡了缺乏新的股票回购、美国销售不佳以及阿根廷恶性通货膨胀的影响，百威英博股价下滑了 2%。
item.description:
WATCH: AB InBev beat sales estimates and raised its annual dividend by nine percent. But its shares slipped two percent as investors weighed the absence of a new share buyback, poor US sales and the impact of hyperinflation in Argentina https://t.co/glJX97gpkw pic.twitter.com/cityXx7xyz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：受交易所交易基金推出的提振，比特币飙升至 63,000 美元左右，一些交易商称，比特币似乎将测试 2021 年底创下的约 69,000 美元的历史高点。
item.description:
WATCH: Boosted by the launch of exchange-traded funds, Bitcoin soars to around $63,000, as some traders say it looks set to test the record high of about $69,000 set in late 2021 https://t.co/6fnONPiAsr pic.twitter.com/svfLln946H

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 由于服务成本的强劲增长，美国 1 月份的物价有所回升，但通胀的年度增幅是三年来最小的，这使得美联储在年中降息的可能性继续存在。更多信息
item.description:
US prices picked up in January amid strong gains in the costs of services, but the annual increase in inflation was the smallest in three years, keeping a mid-year rate cut from the Federal Reserve on the table. Read more: https://t.co/KT0Ymz9oUA pic.twitter.com/fC4sew5sBK

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，OpenAI 正在接受美国监管机构的调查。据报道，美国证券交易委员会（SEC）正在审查公司首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的内部通信，据说还在 12 月向公司发出了传票。更多信息
item.description:
OpenAI is under investigation by US regulators, according to the Wall Street Journal. It reported the SEC is scrutinizing internal communications by company CEO Sam Altman and is also said to have sent a subpoena to the company in December. Read more: https://t.co/r1XqSifNty pic.twitter.com/SAbgzUe7PA

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024
